groupId.description: Assigned by the system if not provided. Starts with 1 and increments for each group associated with a home.

interest.description: Describes the group ownership portion as a fraction. Does not apply and may be omitted for the Sole Ownership (SOLE) type.

interestNumerator.description: Represents the group ownership portion as the numerator of a fraction. Does not apply and may be omitted for the Sole Ownership (SOLE) type.

interestDenominator.description: Represents the group ownership portion as the denominator of a fraction. Does not apply and may be omitted for the Sole Ownership (SOLE) type.

type.description: The type of owner group. JOINT - joint tenancy; SOLE - sole ownership; COMMON - tenants in common; JT - joint tenancy (deprecated); SO - sole ownership (deprecated); TC - tenants in common (deprecated).

tenancySpecified.description: Flag indicating details on the JT or TC types are included. If false, no interest or interest numerator is provided.
